[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [URI](./format.uri.md)

## URI class

The URI formatter based on RFC 3986.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class URI extends URIReference 
```
**Extends:** [URIReference](./format.urireference.md)

## Example 1


```ts
URI.parse("https://example.com/path?query#fragment");
// {
//   scheme: "https",
//   ... // same as URIReference
// }
```

## Example 2


```ts
URI.parse("http://한국.com/path?query#fragment");
// {
//   scheme: "http",
//   authority: {
//     host: "xn--3e0b707e.com",
//     ... // same as Authority
//   },
//   ... // same as URIReference
// }
```

## Example 3


```ts
URI.parse("http://한국.com/경로?쿼리#프래그먼트", { isIri: true });
// {
//   scheme: "http",
//   authority: {
//     host: "한국.com",
//     ... // same as Authority
//   },
//   ... // same as URIReference
// }
```
